website_summaries.verdict: This machine is simple to use and has a functional design, making it a good choice for anyone who wants a card shuffler for 4 or less standard decks.
pros: Works with as many as 4 standard-size decks without slowing down
Shuffles fast, and is easy to use, even for novices
Also easy to take with you for games away from home
Build feels reasonably durable for the price
cons: Doesn't get very long battery life
May slow down a bit if decks aren't standard-size

customer_reviews.title: Time saver and great for kids that don't know how to shuffle
customer_reviews.text: This works great for a fast efficient way to shuffle cards. It does require 4 C batteries that are not included. There are also places to put the stickers on to prevent scuffing the table but they are also not included. This has been a huge time saver for us and no more pointing the blame at someone for not shuffling the cards good.
customer_reviews.author: dsho

customer_reviews.title: Card shuffler not worth the cost of the batteries!
customer_reviews.text: This card shuffler arrived with no instructions, not even a notation of what size batteries to use. Perhaps that’s OK since, even with batteries in place, it usually doesn’t work. I have to open it up and wiggle the batteries to get it to work. It runs upside down, then fails when it’s turned over. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They will made teaching card game to a grandchild way easier
customer_reviews.text: Only took away one star because of the difficulty of installing the C size batteries in the case Without damaging the tension springs that are the contacts for the power circuit. I don't believe it can be done without a shim or spacer to hold them in place. To keep the springs from being bent out of shape and opening the power circuit.
